description: Detects the use of stordiag.exe to execute schtasks.exe systeminfo.exe and fltmc.exe Author: Austin Songer (@austinsonger). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Execution via stordiag.exe
query: ((process.parent.executable:*\\stordiag.exe AND process.executable:(*\\schtasks.exe OR *\\systeminfo.exe OR *\\fltmc.exe)) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:(c\:\\windows\\system32\\* OR c\:\\windows\\syswow64\\*))))
